p: Following GRTs performed on HIV-1 “ pol” gene for detecting RAMs and gp120 V3-loop for coreceptor-usage (using the geno2pheno method [ https://coreceptor.geno2pheno.org/]) at three different time points [ 10, 11], phylogeny consistently revealed the virus to be HIV-1 CRF18_cpx. All sequences generated were submitted to GeneBank (MN52015 – MN520219).
